titles.title: To override the income tax treaty with Barbados.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/17/2003--Introduced. Applies the Internal Revenue Code without regard to the Convention between the United States of America and Barbados for the Avoidance of Double Taxation and the Prevention of Fiscal Evasion with Respect to Taxes on Income signed on December 31, 1984.
